title: The Richard Laymon Ebook Library (2014 Update) -emidius-
description:
The Richard Laymon Ebook Library (2014 Update) -emidius-

48 Works of Fiction By a True Master of Horror (Mixed Epub and Mobi)

Richard Carl Laymon was an American author of suspense and horror fiction, particularly within the splatterpunk subgenre. Richard Laymon died in 2001 of a massive heart attack and is survived by his wife, Ann, and daughter, Kelly.
